title: Crystal Charest, Naturopath, Miramichi | Lumino Health
description: Crystal Charest offers Naturopath services in Miramichi. Click to request your appointment.
cleaned_text: - Woman - $80 - $109 per visit Accepting new patients Provider's hours Sunday Closed Monday 9:00 am - 5:00 pm Tuesday 8:00 am - 6:00 pm Wednesday 9:00 am - 6:00 pm Thursday 8:00 am - 5:00 pm Friday 9:00 am - 5:00 pm Saturday Closed Description Dr. Crystal Charest, BSc, ND Miramichi Naturopathic Health Clinic Dr. Charest graduated from University of New Brunswick in Fredericton in 1998 with a Bachelor of Science in Biology. In 2002, she graduated from the Canadian College of Naturopathic Medicine in Toronto, Ontario. Dr. Charest ND has been practicing for 16 years with Natural and Preventive practice located in Miramichi, New Brunswick with a special interest in Chelation and Vitamin/ Nutrient Intravenous Therapy, sports related injuries using Ozone, Prolotherapy and Biopuncture. Languages spoken - English Education - University of New Brunswick in Fredericton with a Bachelor of Science in Biology. - Canadian College of Naturopathic Medicine in Toronto, Ontario. Professional associations - University of New Brunswick in Fredericton with a Bachelor of Science in Biology. - Canadian College of Naturopathic Medicine in Toronto, Ontario. - New Brunswick Association of Naturopathic Doctors (NBAND) Facility Information Miramichi Naturopathic Health Cli Summary Naturopathic medicine is a unique and comprehensive approach to improving health and treating illness. Focusing on prevention, and using natural substances and treatments, naturopathic doctors (NDs) support and stimulate the body's ability to heal itself. The primary goal of naturopathic treatment is to address the cause of illness, rather than simply treat or suppress symptoms. The patient is seen as a whole person and the ND takes the physical, mental, emotional, and spiritual dimensions into account when diagnosing and developing a treatment plan.
